12.8.19  6:03 am   do things bother you? should i learn how to not let things bother me? how? it seems i'm always bothered, and i think that bothers me.

Â Â Â Â Â one of the only things that bothers me is when journalists or interviewers literally ask if a specific thing bothers the person. "does it bother you that..." etc. it's like they are deliberately trying to suggest things they expect SHOULD bother me. your question is more ok though because it doesn't mention a specific thing. ah, nevermind who am i kidding i am bothered by everything. i was born bothered

12.8.19  5:41 am   what if the research period isn't over, bill. i just spent 24.5 hours over three days on a video game that was so good, it's blown my mind wide open. and i thought it was open BEFORE. game was [WITHHELD] for the record i wouldnt withhold that info just in case. but youre usually so averse seeming to spending time being the consumer (unless we're talking about pop radio for some reason (wait i know the reason it's a reaction (to a reaction))(and one i agree with, but i digress)). im just saying. if i were you with what i know now, after this game, id be thinking, shit, i gotta find more good stuff i can get in my brain. but forget sifting through the mud. id be thinking, i need some kind of diamond deliverer to juice this machine way into overdrive. i mean, i felt like such an idiot playing this game, and now i feel measurably smarter for having played it. is that not a currency that you feel you want to deal in, or are your investments so locked d own that changing business model stands to possibly destabilize the entire company? man i dunno just work with me here are you sure youre not cheating yourself by counting out all this incredible content

Â Â Â Â Â you suggested for me NOT to "withhold" the name of the game, and withhold means to not reveal it, so it sounded like you were saying that i should not hide the name of the game, but in the context i determined it was more likely you meant that i SHOULD withhold it (not display it) i.e. not DISCLOSE it. so using my best judgement i censored the name because i wouldn't want to mess that up for you. and if you are wondering whether i am vastly and sickeningly excited about every kind of content in the entire galaxy, the answer is yes i am
